DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare two different dosing regimens of phosphatidylcholine versus placebo for the induction of remission in ulcerative colitis patients non-responsive to standard mesalamine treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Phosphatidylcholine (LT-02) for Induction of Remission in Ulcerative Colitis
